## Example Random Samples

```{r, random-sample}
set.seed(20150516)

xSymm <- rexp(n = 1000, rate = 20)
samplesSymm_ls <- list(
  n5   = xSymm[1:5],
  n50  = xSymm[1:50],
  n500 = xSymm[1:500],
  n1000 = xSymm
)
rangeSymm_num <- range(xSymm)

xSkew <- rpois(n = 1000, lambda = 2.5)
samplesSkew_ls <- list(
  n5   = xSkew[1:5],
  n30  = xSkew[1:30],
  n100 = xSkew[1:100],
  n500 = xSkew
)
rangeSkew_num <- range(xSkew)

rm(xSymm, xSkew)
```

```{r}
#| label: shared-density-plotting-function
PlotSharedDensity <- function(x, range_x) {
  plot(
    density(x, from = range_x[1], to = range_x[2])
  )
}
```


```{r}
#| label: random-sample-hist-skew
#| fig-show: "hold"

par(mfrow = c(2, 2))

PlotSharedDensity(x = samplesSymm_ls$n5, range_x = rangeSymm_num)
PlotSharedDensity(x = samplesSymm_ls$n50, range_x = rangeSymm_num)
PlotSharedDensity(x = samplesSymm_ls$n500, range_x = rangeSymm_num)
PlotSharedDensity(x = samplesSymm_ls$n1000, range_x = rangeSymm_num)

par(mfrow = c(1, 1))
```

```{r}
#| label: random-sample-hist-symm
#| fig-show: "hold"

par(mfrow = c(2, 2))

hist(samplesSymm_ls$n5, breaks = binsSymm_int)
hist(samplesSymm_ls$n30, breaks = binsSymm_int)
hist(samplesSymm_ls$n100, breaks = binsSymm_int)
hist(samplesSymm_ls$n500, breaks = binsSymm_int)

par(mfrow = c(1, 1))
```
